name: Material palette
description:
Easily create a Material Design/UI Palette!


Select between 3 available schemas:

* Material – Material palette schema!

* Monochrome – Tweaks Hue, Saturation and Lightness to generate a monochrome palette.

* True monochrome – Tweaks Saturation and Lightness while leaving Hue behind.


Use the available options to further configure the palette to suit your needs


Link to source code:

https://github.com/Leolainen/figma-plugin-Material-palette


Inspired by a Codepen by Sebastian Lasse


Created by Leo
